subject: Soccer
UEFA European Football Championship
Corruption (Institutional)
Race and Ethnicity
lead_paragraph: A BBC documentary exposed racism at stadiums in Poland and Ukraine, the co-hosts of the tournament, while Italy is left to deal with a widening match-fixing scandal.
snippet: A BBC documentary exposed racism at stadiums in Poland and Ukraine, the co-hosts of the tournament, while Italy is left to deal with a widening match-fixing scandal.
